content.prompt: Which of the following contributed most to the trend in African American migration from the South between 1940 and 1949 ?

choices.label: The availability of industrial employment during the Second World War
The passage of laws in the North and the West against racial segregation
The economic dislocation of farmers caused by the Great Depression
The internment of people thought to be national security threats

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
